name: Apex-Brasil Brussels-Europe
goal:
Apex-Brasil is the Brazilian Trade Promotion and Investment Agency. Our mission is to develop the competitiveness of Brazilian companies, to promote their internationalisation as well as to attract Foreign Direct Investment to Brazil.

Apex-Brasil offers a number of services to promote the sustainability and competitiveness of Brazilian companies in their internationalisation process, including market intelligence, capacity-building programmes and trade promotion activities.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Consumer Affairs, Customs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Research and Technology, Trade
